meanings.sent1: Her face looked even dimplier when she smiled.
meanings.sent2: The baby's cheeks were dimplier than the mother's.
meanings.sent3: The dimplier cheeks made everyone around her smile too.
meanings.sent4: His dimplier face lit up the room like a sunny day.
meanings.sent5: The dimplier appearance of the child brought joy to all who saw.

meanings.sent1: The dimplier fabric felt soft against her skin.
meanings.sent2: The dimplier texture of the material made it perfect for cuddling.
meanings.sent3: She joked that the dimplier blanket was like hugging a cloud.
meanings.sent4: The dimplier surface of the fruit reminded her of a gentle wave.
meanings.sent5: The dimplier pattern on the dress added a touch of elegance.

meanings.sent1: The dimplier cheeks on the baby made everyone smile.
meanings.sent2: Her dimplier smile brightened up the room.
meanings.sent3: He teased his friend about having a dimplier face than him.
meanings.sent4: The dimplier skin on the peach made it look sweeter.
meanings.sent5: The dimplier appearance of the cake made it irresistible.
